title: After ancient skulls unearthed in North Kamloops, band urges B.C. to overhaul heritage rules
description: The chief of Tk'emlúps te Secwépemc says B.C. should change its laws so private landowners aren't “discouraged” or afraid to report the discovery of human remains, warning current rules risk driving such finds underground.Last June, landscapers working on a site in Nort...

title: After ancient skulls unearthed in North Kamloops, band urges B.C. to overhaul heritage rules
description: The chief of Tk’emlúps te Secwépemc says B.C. should change its laws so private landowners aren’t “discouraged” or afraid to report the discovery of human remains, warning current rules risk driving such finds underground.

title: A lost world: Ancient cave reveals million-year-old wildlife
description: Australian and New Zealand scientists have unearthed the remains of ancient wildlife in a cave near Waitomo on Aotearoa's North Island, the first time a large number of million-year-old fossils have been found – including an ancestor of the large flightless Kākāpō parrot. The discovery of fossils from 12 ancient bird species and four frog species has opened a rare window into how New Zealand looked about 1 million years ago.

title: Anhui’s Breathtaking Winter Travel Escape Where Snow‐Blanketed Peaks, Sea of Clouds, Ancient Pines and Historic Paths Create Unforgettable Scenic Magic!
description: Anhui’s Breathtaking Winter Travel Escape Where Snow‐Blanketed Peaks, Sea of Clouds, Ancient Pines and Historic Paths Create Unforgettable Scenic Magic!Discover Huangshan in Anhui, China’s legendary Yellow Mountains with winter snow, sea of clouds, sunrise views, hiking trails and year‐round scenic wonder.The post Anhui’s Breathtaking Winter Travel Escape Where Snow‐Blanketed Peaks, Sea of Clouds, Ancient Pines and Historic Paths Create Unforgettable Scenic Magic! appeared first on Travel And Tour World.
